name: Scrambled Eggs (Rick)
description:
I made this game in 7 days for the brackeys game jam Theme: "An end is a new beginning"

I came up with the idea of a game where you'd be able to choose your own respawn locations. I thought that a chicken🐔 would fit the theme really well since their eggs🥚 could be used as respawn locations!

Have Fun! :) Post your time after beating the game! Controls:
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys
  • JUMP: spacebar
  • Laying eggs: E
  • PAUSE: ESC
  • ctrl/MB1: Also does something... you'll have to figure that out!
Software used:
  • Aseprite
  • Vegas pro 14
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Photoshop
  • Soundly
  • Windows Audio Recorder
  • MagicaVoxel
Credits for the music used:
  •  Game Over music: Buttercup by MixAndMash
  •  Gameplay music: Run Little Chicken by The Mini Vandals
  •  Gameplay music: 8bit Dungeon Level by Kevin MacLeod
Credits for the fonts used:
  • Title font: Stacked Pixel
  • Text font: m6x11
